description:
NOTE: There's no functionality described for arrows, padding, labels, graphTitle,
scoringType, studentInstructions, teacherInstructions
so there's no implementation (they are only added in model)
Model Object for @pie-elements/graphing

answers.description: Indicates marks that are set as answers; Note: alternates can be added having this form: alternateIndex

showLabel.description: Indicates if label should be visible
showLabel.title: showLabel

building.description: Indicates if mark is in build process
building.title: building

x.description: Indicates x coordinate if type is point
x.title: x

y.description: Indicates y coordinate if type is point
y.title: y

closed.description: Indicates if mark is closed if type is polygon, sine
closed.title: closed

points.description: Indicates all mark's points if type is polygon
points.title: points

studentInstructions.title: studentInstructions

teacherInstructions.description: Indicates if teacher instructions are enabled

id.description: Identifier to identify the Pie Element in html markup, Must be unique within a pie item config.
id.title: id

settings.description: Indicates if the item has to be displayed
settings.title: settings

label.description: Indicates the label for the item
label.title: label

enabled.description: Indicates the value of the item if it affects config-ui (eg.: if item is a switch)
enabled.title: enabled
